casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the INVESTIGATION OF BURGLARY AND THEFT. M-675 September Term 2018
082243 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 8, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the State of New Jersey for leave to appeal is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the appellant may electronically serve and file a supplemental brief on or before May 7, 2019, and respondent may electronically serve and file a supplemental brief forty-five (45) days after the filing of appellant's supplemental submission, or, if appellant declines to file such a submission, on or before June 21, 2019.
